sourceMeaningMnemonic: To <radical>say</radical> what's in a <radical>samurai</radical>'s <radical>heart</radical> you start a <kanji>magazine</kanji>. You go around writing about and interviewing all the samurai so you can share what they say to everyone who wants to read!
meaningInfo: Why hadn't anyone thought of making a samurai magazine before?!
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately, your <kanji>magazine</kanji> helps the <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>) samurai find other samurai... and kill them. None of the samurai want to share their feelings with your magazine anymore, oh no!
readingInfo: The sheep samurai is ruining your magazine! Maybe you should start a new magazine called, "All the places the sheep samurai will be, so stay away!" to make up for all the damage you've caused.
